column4: i need help i followed some guys advice here http://www.linux.com/archive/forums/topic/3838 concerning fixinv my key ring issue so i did `sudo apt-get remove --purge gnome-keyring` and now my wireless is jacked
i had to reinstall networkmanager and got that back up but i no longer have a wireless icon in the top right of my screen
is the notification area still there
if you don't tab complete we don't know your answering us. :) yes right click the panel add to panel the notification area
